My Work

All sites are designed by me in Adobe Suite. Unless otherwise stated, they feature my own branding and photography. All YouTube tutorials are from my own channel.

Portfolio Site GitHub

A responsive site, built on a personal CSS grid, and tested on multiple devices. It is compiled with Sass and operates with vanilla JS only.
tDigital- PhotoShop Tutorials GitHub

A responsive site, using the Bootstrap framework for page structure only. It operates with my own combination of jQuery and vanilla JS.
Iceland- Travel Journal and Gallery GitHub

A responsive site, utlising the Bootstrap framework for both CSS and jQuery.
URL Shortener GitHub

This test page demonstrates post requests to the 'Rebrandly' API, through ES8 promises.
